occupation: Aviator, Business magnate, Film director, Philanthropist
achievements: Produced and directed films such as Hell's Angels and Scarface
Known for his eccentric personality and reclusiveness
Pioneered the shock jock radio format
Won numerous Peabody Awards and Emmy Awards
Hosted The Howard Stern Show for over 30 years
Authored A People's History of the United States, a best-selling and influential history book
Actively participated in civil rights and anti-war movements
